errors.error_description: The instructions for creating and activating a virtual environment are placed after the package installation commands, which is the wrong logical order. The environment should be created before installation.
correction_candidates: Move the 'Recommended: Virtual Environment' section before the 'Standard installation' section.
Change `python -m venv venv` to `conda create -n lobsterpy_env python=3.9`.
Remove the 'Recommended: Virtual Environment' section as pip handles this automatically.
Add `pip install virtualenv` before creating the environment.
errors.golden_answer: Move the 'Recommended: Virtual Environment' section before the 'Standard installation' section.

errors.error_description: The command `lobsterpy plot --bonds 1,2` uses an incorrect flag and syntax to specify which bonds to plot.
correction_candidates: ``lobsterpy plot --bonds "1 2"`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot 1,2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot --bond 1 --bond 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot 1 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
errors.golden_answer: ``lobsterpy plot 1 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
